ABS-CBN thanks artists for support to network amid broadcast shutdown tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-738224 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/738224/abs-cbn-thanks-artists-for-support-to-network-amid-broadcast-shutdown/story/ ABS-CBN on Thursday sent a message of thanks to all artists who expressed their concern and support to the TV network after it was forced to shut down its broadcast operations in the absence of a valid franchise. Medialdea orders PNP to submit to Palace findings of probe into Sinas mañanita tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-738213 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/738213/medialdea-orders-pnp-to-submit-to-palace-findings-of-probe-into-sinas-mananita/story/ “I think it is a significant development na no less than the Executive Secretary has ordered the investigation and the results be forwarded to his office,” presidential spokesperson Harry Roque said. “Hayaan na muna nating umusad ang imbestigasyon bago natin pag-usapan ang parusa.” Thu, 14 May 2020 13:31:57 +0800
